name: 1ST-G
description:
Hello everyone. This is my first game that took more than 150 hours. I am a person who likes to play games a lot. So now, while I was creating a game, everyone had a problem about quarantine. So I created a game to play with friends and family I hope that this game will make everyone enjoy.

P.s I use google translate ;p

P.s If the game has a problem, contact tickstudiu@gmail.com
